item.gofish.steamed_bass.tooltip_1: It almost disappeared in the oven,
item.gofish.aquatic_astral_stew.tooltip_: is a mix of various astral fish
and contains a galaxy of flavors.
item.gofish.endfish_and_chorus.tooltip_2: reminds you of Fish n' Chips.
item.gofish.baked_endfish.tooltip_1: The tender meat of this Baked Endfish
item.gofish.baked_endfish.tooltip_2: melts in your mouth like butter.
item.gofish.grilled_blackstone_deluxe.to: The savory meat of this grilled Blackstone Trout
is wonderfully complimented by buttery potatoes
and a touch of fresh greens.
advancements.fishing.root.title: Fishing Journey
advancements.fishing.root.description: Begin your fishing journey by obtaining a Fishing Rod.
advancements.fishing.full_moon_fish.desc: Catch all the special fish during a full moon.
advancements.fishing.weather_fish.title: Stormy Seas
advancements.fishing.golden_lure.title: The Great Golden Lure
advancements.fishing.golden_lure.descrip: Find a Golden Fish while fishing. It looks like it would work well as a lure!
advancements.fishing.seaweed.title: Good Ol' Seaweed
advancements.fishing.seaweed.description: Catch some Seaweed while fishing. I thought it was a big one!
advancements.fishing.seaweed_eel.title: Suspicious Seaweed
advancements.fishing.seaweed_eel.descrip: Catch a Seaweed Eel while fishing.
advancements.fishing.baked_seaweed.title: Seaweed Upgrades
advancements.fishing.baked_seaweed.descr: Transform some unwanted Seaweed into Baked Seaweed.
advancements.fishing.grilled_blackstone_: Make the ultimate meal with a cooked Blackstone Trout and Baked Seaweed for a refreshing touch.
advancements.fishing.aquatic_astral_stew: Create an Aquatic Astral Stew using your catch from a full moon.
advancements.fishing.astral_crate.title: A Crate from Outer Space
advancements.fishing.astral_crate.descri: Fish up an Astral Crate while fishing under a full moon.
advancements.fishing.wooden_crate.title: Simple Crates
advancements.fishing.wooden_crate.descri: Obtain a Wooden Crate while fishing. Shift-click while looking at air to open it!
advancements.fishing.iron_crate.title: Crate Upgrades
advancements.fishing.iron_crate.descript: Obtain an Iron Crate while fishing.
advancements.fishing.golden_crate.title: Fancy Crates
advancements.fishing.golden_crate.descri: Fish up a Crate adorned in gold. What could ever be inside?
advancements.fishing.diamond_crate.title: Ultimate Fishing Rewards
advancements.fishing.diamond_crate.descr: Fish up a Diamond Crate, the ultimate reward for any kind of fisher.
advancements.fishing.supply_crate.title: Humble Alternatives
advancements.fishing.supply_crate.descri: Fish up the Wooden Crates' sibling: the Supply Crate.
